criteria.desc: Identifies single-stage current-mirror OTA with high-swing output path (PMOS to VDD and NMOS mirror to ground).
High-side swing: vout_max ≈ VDD - Vov of the PMOS device tied directly to vout.
Low-side swing: vout_min ≈ Vov of the NMOS mirror device tied directly to vout (ground side).
States saturation/headroom conditions and defines Vov/V*; may note that internal nodes should remain saturated but output limit is set by devices directly tied to vout.
References real elements from inventory (e.g., M6 PMOS at vout, M8 NMOS mirror at vout, CL, vout, VDD).
Avoids asserting parts that don't exist (no hallucinated IDs).
